iakbari.ruletranslator.translator

Class inputHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • iakbari.ruletranslator.translator.inputHandler

  • public class inputHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    This class handles rule translation (or rule inference in case of RIF) based on user selection on main gui.
    Author:
    Ismail Akbari

      java.lang.String translate(java.lang.String sourceLanguage, java.lang.String input, boolean CST)
      This method runs the appropriate translator (rule engine in case of RIF) based on user selection on main frame.

      • translate

        public java.lang.String translate(java.lang.String sourceLanguage,
                                  java.lang.String input,
                                  boolean CST)
                           throws java.io.IOException
        This method runs the appropriate translator (rule engine in case of RIF) based on user selection on main frame.
        Parameters:
        sourceLanguage - source language to be translated to RIF.
        input - The rules in source language
        CST - Whether to show the CST tree
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • showCST

        public static void showCST(RIFBLDParser parser,
                           org.antlr.v4.runtime.tree.ParseTree tree,
                           RIFBLDParser inferred_parser,
                           org.antlr.v4.runtime.tree.ParseTree inferred_tree)

      • n3Handler

        public static java.lang.String n3Handler(java.lang.String data,
                                         boolean CST)
                                  throws java.io.IOException
        This method translates N3 rules to RIF-BLD rules.
        Parameters:
        data - it contains the rules of the source language written in the source text area of the main gui.
        CST - Whether to show Concrete Syntax Tree or not.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - throws IOException
        java.io.IOException

      • poslHandler

        public static java.lang.String poslHandler(java.lang.String data,
                                           boolean CST)
                                    throws java.io.IOException
        This method translates POSL rules to RIF-BLD rules.
        Parameters:
        data - it contains the rules of the source language written in the source text area of the main gui.
        CST - Whether to show Concrete Syntax Tree or not.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - throws IOException
        java.io.IOException

      • rifHandler

        public static java.lang.String rifHandler(java.lang.String data,
                                          boolean CST)
                                   throws java.io.IOException
        This method parses the input RIF rules. It generates parse tree of the input rules. The method then calls the RIF engine to infer new knowledge. Finally it generates a parse tree of the new knowledge base as well.
        Parameters:
        data - it contains the rules of the source language written in the source text area of the main gui.
        CST - Whether to show Concrete Syntax Tree of the input rules as well as the inferred rules.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - throws file IO exception
        java.io.IOException

      • RIF2XML

        public static java.lang.String RIF2XML(java.lang.String data,
                                       boolean CST)
                                throws java.io.IOException
        This method parses the input RIF rules. It generates parse tree of the input rules. The method then translates the input RIF rules (in presentation syntax) to RIF XML syntax.
        Parameters:
        data - it contains the rules of the source language written in the source text area of the main gui.
        CST - Whether to show Concrete Syntax Tree of the input rules as well as the inferred rules.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - throws file IO exception
        java.io.IOException

      • rulemlHandler

        public static java.lang.String rulemlHandler(java.lang.String data,
                                             boolean CST)
                                      throws java.io.IOException
        This method translates RuleML XML to RIF-BLD XML with the help of developed XSL stylesheet.
        Parameters:
        data - it contains the rules of the source language written in the source text area of the main GUI.
        CST - Whether to show Concrete Syntax Tree of the input rules as well as the inferred rules. CST must be false since Datalog RuleML is in XML syntax.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - throws file IO exception
        java.io.IOException

      • swrlHandler

        public static java.lang.String swrlHandler(java.lang.String data,
                                           boolean CST)
                                    throws java.io.IOException
        This method translates SWRL XML to RIF-BLD XML with the help of developed XSL stylesheet. result is saved in the 'output' directory
        Parameters:
        data - it contains the rules of the source language written in the source text area of the main GUI.
        CST - Whether to show Concrete Syntax Tree of the input rules as well as the inferred rules. CST must be false since SWRL is in XML syntax.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - throws file IO exception
        java.io.IOException
